sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Higher Education Fair Admissions Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Higher Education Fair Admissions Act.

sections.heading: Rules. The Board of Higher Education may adopt any rules necessary to implement this Act.
sections.text: Rules. The Board of Higher Education may adopt any rules necessary to implement this Act.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2022.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2022.
